Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory173.png'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'No. 21, functional output lowering.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Work till you actually freeze. You know how much of a hole your maintenance cost is putting in our budget?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Aw, Vera, you puttin' in work yourself, girl? Not time to be worryin' for that marshmallow blob!"}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Shut up, Mr. Low-Power-Mode!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: '...DAMN YOU, ASIMOV!!!'}
{3: 'Roland is using his troops to keep Noctis and No. 21 at bay. Vera can only reach them through their team channel. Her expression turns impatient.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "Look at you, fighting amongst yourselves... I have to admit, I've never seen a team quite like yours.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "You say it like you've met a lot of 'em, but I know you've only been frolicking with those Gray Ravens. Don't you dare group me with those amateurs!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Well, well...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As Roland speaks, a series of loud explosions suddenly send nigh-invisible golden particles dancing in the air.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Hey, Vera, we're catchin' some weird dust 'ere..."}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Golden Vortex related.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'HQ prepared these behind our backs, huh?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'The explosions came from somewhere near Miss Luna and Alpha. I doubt these particles will affect them, but... ', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Roland brushes aside the gold dust in front of him. He jumps off the platform, and brandishes his chain blade and gun.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: '...This reminds me of an unpleasant past.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Finally out of you shell, Roland?!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I've got somewhere to be now, so let's quickly get this over with.", 4: '1'}
